environment
Class Environment

java.lang.Object
  environment.Environment

public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object

Class Environment manages a collection of variables and procedures. Environment objects are called as parameters in the AST as all the variables are stored in an Environment.

Version:
April 8, 2020
Author:
Emily Liu

Parameters:
vars - the hashmap used to maintain the variable names and values.
prs - the hashmap used to maintain the procedure names and declarations
e - the parent environment
